languages.text: "Андровета-Фи, убедите духа машины сотрудничать. Иначе убеждать буду я".
"Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."
languages.original_text: "Андровета-Фи, убедите духа машины сотрудничать. Иначе убеждать буду я".

traits.locale_text: "Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I will do the persuading myself."
"Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I will do the persuading myself."
"Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."
"Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."
"Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."
"Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."

languages.text: « Androveta-Phi, vous allez convaincre l'esprit de la machine de coopérer. Autrement, c'est moi qui m'en chargerai. »
languages.original_text: "Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."

traits.locale_text: « Androveta-Phi, vous allez convaincre l'esprit de la machine de coopérer. Autrement, c'est moi qui m'en chargerai. »

languages.text: «Androveta-Phi, persuadirá al espíritu máquina para que coopere. Si no lo hace, lo persuadiré yo mism{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."

traits.locale_text: «Androveta-Phi, persuadirá al espíritu máquina para que coopere. Si no lo hace, lo persuadiré yo mism{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: “安多维塔-菲，你负责说服机魂和我合作。如果你做不到的话，我就要亲自说服它了。”
languages.original_text: "Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."

traits.locale_text: “安多维塔-菲，你负责说服机魂和我合作。如果你做不到的话，我就要亲自说服它了。”

languages.text: 「アンドロベータ・ファイ、君は機械精霊に協力するよう説得するんだ。お前がそうしないのなら、私が説得しよう」
languages.original_text: "Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."

traits.locale_text: 「アンドロベータ・ファイ、君は機械精霊に協力するよう説得するんだ。お前がそうしないのなら、私が説得しよう」

languages.text: "Androveta-Phi, Ihr werdet den Maschinengeist zur Kooperation überreden. Tut Ihr das nicht, so übernehme ich das Überreden selbst."
languages.original_text: "Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."

traits.locale_text: "Androveta-Phi, Ihr werdet den Maschinengeist zur Kooperation überreden. Tut Ihr das nicht, so übernehme ich das Überreden selbst."

languages.text: "Androveta-Fi, makine ruhunu iş birliğine ikna edeceksin. Etmezsen ikna kısmını bizzat gerçekleştireceğim."
languages.original_text: "Androveta-Phi, you will persuade the machine spirit to cooperate. If you do not, I shall do the persuading myself."
